item.description:
Come learn how to quickly and easily create a FaceBook app!

We will demonstrate how to build a FaceBook application from scratch using codeigniter PHP framework.

After an brief introduction to codeigniter, we will move to building a FaceBook application which includes - Facebook PHP API, explanation of the form when creating a new application, generating news feeds, generating notifications etc. We'll also touch upon FBML and XFBML and how they can be used for iframe applications by using FaceBook JavaScript API. After this, any beginner would be able to develop FaceBook applications.

Please RSVP soon - this event will fill up quick!
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the main entrance on 296 Washington street. Take the elevators to 11th floor. Then ring the buzzer for Optaros across from the elevator lobby. Don't be late as some have had trouble getting in after hours.
item.name: Learn how to create a FaceBook app
